name: reuse-api
description: Tests for Qmate as a test automation framework

scripts.preinstall: npm config set chromedriver_skip_download=true && npm install chromedriver --chromedriver_skip_download=true
scripts.test: npm run test:reuse && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:qmate:functional
scripts.test:reuse: npm run test:reuse:ui5 && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:reuse:nonUi5 && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:reuse:auth && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:reuse:utilities && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:reuse:odata
scripts.test:reuse:ui5: node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/locator/test.locators.conf.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/assertion/test.assertion.conf.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/confirmationDialog/test.confirmationDialog.conf.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/date/test.date.conf.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/formatter/test.formatter.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/session/test.session.conf.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/iconTabBar/test.iconTabBar.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/userInteraction/test.userInteraction.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/navigationBar/test.navigationBar.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/navigation/test.navigation.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/client/test.client.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/ui5/specs/errorDialog/test.errorDialog.conf.js
scripts.test:reuse:nonUi5: node sleeper.js 20 && npx wdio tests/reuse/nonUi5/specs/navigation/test.navigation.conf.js && node sleeper.js 20 && npx wdio tests/reuse/nonUi5/specs/locator/test.locators.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/nonUi5/specs/assertion/test.assertion.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/reuse/nonUi5/specs/userInteraction/test.userInteraction.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15
scripts.test:reuse:auth: npm run test:reuse:auth:systemLogin && node sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:reuse:auth:staticLogin
scripts.test:reuse:auth:systemLogin: node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/systemLogin/configCustom.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/systemLogin/configFiori.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/systemLogin/configPlain.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/systemLogin/configSapCloud.js
scripts.test:reuse:auth:staticLogin: node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/staticLogin/configCustom.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/staticLogin/configCustomViaConfig.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/staticLogin/configFiori.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/staticLogin/configPlain.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio tests/reuse/authenticator/staticLogin/configSapCloud.js
scripts.test:reuse:utilities: node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/utilities/formatter/test.formatter.conf.js && node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/utilities/browser/test.browser.conf.js && node sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio tests/reuse/utilities/dialogInteraction/test.conf.js
scripts.test:qmate:functional: npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/assertions/test.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/chaining/test.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/locators/test.locator.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/nativeBrowser/test.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/nonUi5/test.locator.conf.js && node sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio tests/qmate/functional/ui5Properties/test.conf.js
